key_risks: Regulatory and policy risks due to dependence on federal and state incentives
Financial health concerns including high debt levels and operating losses
Intense market competition in the residential solar sector
Customer service and operational issues leading to reputational damage
controversies: Lawsuit by the Connecticut Attorney General alleging deceptive sales practices
Numerous customer complaints regarding installation delays, billing issues, and system failures
social_issues: Customer service issues affecting customer satisfaction and retention
governance_issues: Legal challenges and potential financial penalties from lawsuits
